name: Classic Margarita
description: Classic beverage for any fiesta! Made easily at home.

ingredients.name: Margarita Rim Trimmer™
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or Sea Salt, enough to trim glass rim

preparation: Moisten rim of 2 margarita glasses with lime wedges and dip into Margarita Rim Trimmer™. Gently rotate the glass to evenly ‘frost’ rim. Set aside.
In a cocktail shaker, combine ice cubes with remaining ingredients.
Shake well, strain and pour into prepared glasses. Garnish with a lime wedge.
tips: Make it a Mocktail: Replace tequila with defrosted frozen limeade and replace lime juice with soda water.
